dcterms:creator: A. J. Patton
A. Timmermann
dcterms:description: The Survey of Professional Forecasters (SPF) dataset provides forecasts of inflation and GDP growth from professional economists, which are analyzed to understand the dispersion of forecasts and the factors influencing forecasters' predictions.
dcterms:title: Survey of Professional Forecasters (SPF)

dcterms:creator: R. P. Lieli
A. Nieto-Barthaburu
dcterms:description: The model of PM behavior referenced in the paper discusses how policy-makers' actions and private information influence the forecasting environment and the incentives for forecasters to acquire information.
dcterms:title: Model of PM Behavior

dcterms:description: Various studies referenced in the literature that discuss information acquisition and forecasting, including works by authors such as Colombo, Hellwig, and Morris, which provide insights into the dynamics of information sharing and forecasting under different conditions.
dcterms:title: Related Studies on Information Acquisition
